name: Kitsunetsuki
description:
Kitsunetsuki is a third person VR survival and exploration  experience which sees the player guide a young “Kitsune” (Japanese fox spirit) home. The fox spirit became separated from its mother and can’t remember the way home to its mother and home shrine.

The journey home will bring its own unique challenges however, and the player will need to evade unfriendly forces (Yokai) who want to see the young Kitsune end up lost and alone forever. While navigating an unfamiliar and unforgiving environment with the threat of a pending storm rolling in, you’ll help the young Kitsune on its journey back to reach the safety and protection of its mother's home.
